Title: Inside Perm 36: The Last Gulag
Chapter Markers: {'give me a large con carne pizza for my little friends': '17:34 - 32:39', 'your former president': '32:39 - 33:36', "i just noticed your advert of Rassputin's mens club": '33:36 - 35:55'}
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Under Stalin the G.U.LAG ( Main Administration of Camps ) system spread out across what was the former Soviet Union, swallowing up citizens and foreigners from all corners of the empire. Ukrainians, Estonians, Kyrgyz etc. were taken from their homes and sent north in box cars to the camps to work away their stretches. Millions passed through the camps and many never returned home. Those camps have long been dismantled or converted into regular factories and work places and you'd be hard pressed to know that you were visiting a former camp. However Perm 36 logging camp has been preserved and so I travelled to the very edge of Europe to a village called Kutchino to visit the last Gulag and to see how the prisoners lived.

Title: WORLD'S GREATEST ROAD TRIP - INDIA
Description:
This is part one of a series of films about what is in my opinion the world's greatest road trip - The Himalayan Loop.

The road trip follows the ancient caravan routes from Ladakh down to Himachal Pradesh and then up to Kashmir before crossing the roof of the world back into Ladakh and the end point in Leh.

Title: Hustled by Indian Girls
Description: I consider myself rather good at resisting a smooth tongued salesperson but on a warm day in India's northern state of Himachal Pradesh I met my match. These two young girls hustled me and hustled me good. Watch how they did it.

Title: India's Most Haunted Bridge
Description:
I have seen some strange things on my travels in India but nothing as mysterious as this bridge. Located in an empty Indus river valley in the Himalayas I came across it by chance and am still perplexed as to what it was all about. Was it cursed with some kind of voodoo magic or is there a simpler explanation? 

Would you dare cross it?
